Audio and Video are nice and high quality, but this comes with stupid subtitles. the word "musket" is replaced with "gun". "...rape their women" is replaced with "take your women", the word "coward" is replaced with "chicken", and many other stupid changes.
seriously, these subtitles are retarded. download this version: http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/5909860/Seven.Samurai.1954.720p.BluRay.x264-EbP
